line_2: There Scandal all its store unloads,

line_1: In noble Songs, and lofty Odes,
line_2: They tread on Stars, and talk with Gods;

line_1: Phoebus must write Him am'rous Odes:
line_2: What Work among You Scholar Gods!

line_1: At once to heav'n he soars in lofty odes,
line_2: And sings alone of heroes and of gods;
